796570.name: LiberationTeam
796570.description: LiberationTeam is a Third-Person online shooter military game focused on teamwork and communication. Lead your team to victory by communicating with your teammates with info on enemy locations and yours in this 8v8 online multiplayer. No respawn,No health regain, this game takes skills. Leaving the "Generic-GamePlay" of other titles with new innovation which makes the title more tactical!!! Setting a difference in game-play and something new for players to enjoy and learn!
796570.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
